Virtuous Lindworm.name: Virtuous Lindworm

baseData.description: At the end of your turn, restore 5 defense to your leader. Then draw 5 cards.
baseData.flair: As the heavens are torn asunder, the dark clouds dissipate. The light of judgment reigns, and a merciful verdict is set forth.

evoData.description: (Same as the unevolved form.)
evoData.flair: White lightning tears across the sky, raining salvation onto all in existence. Ah, but do not fear. Bow your head and accept it.
